original_title: 息ぎれの恋人たち (Ikigire no Koibito-Tachi)
overview: Suffering from heartbreak and asthma, 23-year-old Toshiyuki pushes the limits of his body to chase the ghost of his recently deceased boyfriend against the black-blue backdrop of Tokyo’s cityscape. -JAPAN CUTS: Festival of New Japanese Film
title: Breathless Lovers
